entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning late in the morning.
